my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Pintu pagar dapat dibuka. Mahukah anda tolong bukakan pintu dihadapan?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Terima kasih, @user. Huruf terakhir Hijaiyah hari ini dapat ditemukan.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Alright, seems like we're at the end of this path.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: But there's a gate blocking our way.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Seems like we can open the gate.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: @user, will you help us open the gate?

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I think that was the final Hijaiyah letter for this path.
